channel.title: Tox chat warning
channel.description:
So i installed Tox and when i entered the run command this warning showed up: user@host:~$ flatpak run io.github.qtox.qTox
** (qtox:3): WARNING **: Error retrieving accessibility bus address: org.freedesktop.DBus.Error.ServiceUnknown: org.freedesktop.DBus.Error.ServiceUnknown [13:39:49.353 UTC] :0 : Warning: Qt: Session management error: Authentication Rejected, reason : None of the authentication protocols specified are supported and host-based authentication failed [13:39:49.736 UTC] persistence/settings.cpp:129 : Debug: No settings file found, using defaults [13:39:49.736 UTC] persistence/settings.cpp:133 : Debug: "Loading settings from :/conf/qtox.ini" [13:39:49.757 UTC] ipc.cpp:61 : Debug: Our global IPC ID is 2677014424491195426 [13:39:49.757 UTC] main.cpp:258 : Debug: commit: 8eed684c37bd711de2ca4bd863f5f0509edcdc2d
Should i be worried or do something?

item.title: Tox chat warning
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
want2know:

Should i be worried

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/FAQ#Compromise_Indicators
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/FAQ#Non-Responsiveness_to_Concerns

Read full topic

item.title: Tox chat warning
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Take Tox questions to Tox devs please. We can only look into problems caused by the version in Debian repos. Any reason why you’re not using it? It’s installed by default in Whonix 15

Read full topic

item.title: Tox chat warning
item.dc:creator: want2know
item.description:
So i installed Tox and when i entered the run command this warning showed up:
user@host:~$ flatpak run io.github.qtox.qTox

** (qtox:3): WARNING **: Error retrieving accessibility bus address: org.freedesktop.DBus.Error.ServiceUnknown: org.freedesktop.DBus.Error.ServiceUnknown
[13:39:49.353 UTC] :0 : Warning: Qt: Session management error: Authentication Rejected, reason : None of the authentication protocols specified are supported and host-based authentication failed
[13:39:49.736 UTC] persistence/settings.cpp:129 : Debug: No settings file found, using defaults
[13:39:49.736 UTC] persistence/settings.cpp:133 : Debug: “Loading settings from :/conf/qtox.ini”
[13:39:49.757 UTC] ipc.cpp:61 : Debug: Our global IPC ID is 2677014424491195426
[13:39:49.757 UTC] main.cpp:258 : Debug: commit: 8eed684c37bd711de2ca4bd863f5f0509edcdc2d

Should i be worried or do something?

Read full topic
